description:
This extension is to make Weapons Attack system for rpg, this is only sword for now, i'll update this extension in the future
and i want that this extension become an huge extension like the Health extension.
name: WeaponAttack
shortDescription: An Advanced Sword Attack System made with Tween and Sticker.

eventsFunctions.description: Make the player attacks using the weapon sprite.
eventsFunctions.name: ExecuteSword
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM1_ Attacks using _PARAM3_ _PARAM5_ms of duration and _PARAM6_ times bigger _PARAM7_ away from the Player receiving _PARAM8_ of impulse with _PARAM9_ sec of cooldown. _PARAM10_ Mouse Input, _PARAM13_ Gamepad Input, Weapon Collision _PARAM11_ _PARAM12_ , Third Attack _PARAM14_, _PARAM15_ Swing Effect _PARAM16_ Collision _PARAM17_ _PARAM18_ times bigger _PARAM19_ away from the Player, _PARAM20_ Projectile _PARAM21_ _PARAM22_ times bigger _PARAM23_ of speed, Having _PARAM24_ of knockback

parameters.longDescription: Durations is in Milliseconds (the default that i use is 400ms or 0,4 seconds, when you adjust the duration i recommend you adjust cooldown too).
parameters.name: Duration

parameters.longDescription: If you don't need to multiply just apply "0" to the value (default is 6 for an 16x16 sprite).
parameters.name: Scale

parameters.longDescription: distance between player center and the weapon origin & center, by pixel (default is 15).
parameters.name: Distance

parameters.longDescription: the amount of impulse that you get when you swing (like an knockback but reverse) (default is 75)
parameters.name: Force

parameters.longDescription: The time Between the attacks (i recommend to ajust the cooldown the cooldown and duration too)
parameters.name: Cooldown

parameters.longDescription: select an button to be the input of the mouse
parameters.name: Input

parameters.description: Do you want that the swing area have an hit box?
parameters.name: weapCollision

parameters.longDescription:
To make the colision work, you need to create an Sprite and rename it for whatever you want
(it just need to be an square to work).
parameters.name: Collision

parameters.longDescription: Select button to press on the gamepad for the input (Thanks Gamepads extension😍)
parameters.name: GpInput

parameters.longDescription: select Yes if you want that the sword releases an fx (not a projectile) if you don't want, just select No
parameters.name: effect

parameters.description: Do you want that Fx have an hit box?
parameters.name: fxCollision

parameters.description: Scale of the FX (Both X & Y Multiplied)
parameters.longDescription: If you don't need to multiply the scale just apply "0" to the value (default is 8 for an 24x24 sprite).
parameters.name: fxscale

parameters.longDescription: distance between player center and the fx origin & center, by pixel (default is 100).
parameters.name: fxdistance

parameters.longDescription: select Yes if you want that an projectile (like an bullet) creates Every swing, if don't, just select No
parameters.name: projectile

parameters.longDescription: the object that will be released every swing, if you want that the projectile deletes when off screen, make it with "IsOnScreen" extension
parameters.name: projeSprite

parameters.longDescription: If you don't need to multiply the scale just apply "0" to the value (default is 4 for an 16x16 sprite).
parameters.name: projeScale

parameters.longDescription: the speed of the projectile in pixels (thanks force)
parameters.name: projeSpeed

parameters.longDescription: An knockback from getting an hit from the slashed weapon in pixels of course.
parameters.name: Knockback

eventsFunctions.description: Runs an action every attacks is run (once for evert attack).
eventsFunctions.name: OnExecute

parameters.longDescription: The player need to be the same of "Execute an Attack" one.
parameters.name: Player
